item.title: Speed up Sitecore 9 start
item.description: Sitecore 9 can be slow to start, which is especially annoying during development. Below are some configuration tweaks to speed it up.

item.title: Speed up the Catalog Import process
item.description: The performance of the current Catalog import in XC9 update-2 is not so good. This article gives a few tips on how to speed up the import process. After applying these optimizations, importing a sellable item costs about 15 msec.
